lead_paragraph: The Giants got the first of their draft picks under contract, signing defensive end Robert Henderson of Southern Mississippi. Henderson was the second of the team’s picks in the sixth round. Contract terms were not immediately available. The Giants also acquired receiver and returner Craphonso Thorpe on waivers and waived defensive back Miguel Scott.
